section.name: XcodeIndex Task Manual
section.p: XcodeIndex is an Ant task to maintain XCode project files for the purpose of integration with WO tools on the latest Mac OS X.
The nested sources element specifies a FileSet matching a set of project Java source files.
The nested resources element specifies a FileSet matching a set of project resources.
The nested frameworks is a FileSet structure that specifies the names of the WebObjects Frameworks that this application is dependant upon.

p.i: Note: all standard FileSet parameters are supported as well, though dir wouldn't make sense and will be ignored.

tr.td: Logical base location of the framework. Allowed values are "wo.homeroot", "wo.wosystemroot", "wo.localroot" (these are string values, don't include them in ${})

The name if a property that decides if the framework set is included. This is a string value, don't include them in ${}. You can then set the property to include the framework or leave it undefined to leave it out.
Not applicable, leave it out when you want to include the framework by default.
